Subject: EPP - Device Control Not Working For Random Users
Description:
We have EPP device control tied to a few Azure security groups. Membership to one of these groups allows the user to use any device on any machine. We're seeing various users allowed to use USB even when they're not a member of these groups.

Requesting assistance troubleshooting/reviewing this issue.

- Server version/OS are not accurate, I picked something as the EPP console is hanging and I can't access it to get this information
Solution_Comment__c: resolved after clearing the devices cache from the backend
